## SqlExecutor.exec() method

执行mysql sql语句

**Signature:**

```typescript
static exec(em: EntityManager, sql: string, params?: unknown[] | object, start?: number, limit?: number): Promise<unknown | unknown[]>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  em | [EntityManager](./relaen.entitymanager.md) | EntityManager |
|  sql | string | 待执行sql |
|  params | unknown\[\] \| object | _(Optional)_ 参数数组 |
|  start | number | _(Optional)_ 开始记录行 |
|  limit | number | _(Optional)_ 最大记录行 |
